ComicInfo.Title: The Philosopher Finds a Ghost; Masque for a Monster; Celtic Spirits; The Man in the Mirror; The Mask Of Death; Devil's Mansion; The Drums of Cajou
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Philosopher Finds a Ghost: Philosopher Athenodorus rents a house and is visited by a ghostly apparition.
Masque for a Monster: When trapped in a mining cave-in, Frank Wayne develops a trauma. He's afraid of the dark and sees monsters everywhere. Crazed with fear, Wayne commits a murder and has to run from the police.
Celtic Spirits: Report about ghosts being spotted in Scotland.
The Man in the Mirror: The meek Mr. Blane comes into possession of a powerful druid mirror. Releasing the mirror's genie, Blane is drawn into a spiral of violence and death - until he destroys the evil mirror.
The Mask Of Death: A window cleaner discovers the office of a vampire doctor. No one believes his fantastic accusations - until a fatal showdown ensues.
Devil's Mansion: Account of a haunted house in New Orleans.
The Drums of Cajou: Haitian voodoo witch doctor Cajou turns the lovely Lora into a zombie to do his bidding and settle an old score with his adversary Neal. But Cajou is hunted down and killed; and Lora's mission can be thwarted.
